prompts: Create a Fire-type Pokemon that has a yellow body and fiery mane.
Imagine a Pokemon featuring a large flame on its back, with a sleek yellow design.
Show me a creature that embodies the essence of fire, with intense colors and dynamic features.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a fierce fire creature, with a flamboyant tail and sharp eyes.
Design a mythical Pokemon with volcanic patterns and an explosive personality.
Give me a fierce-looking Pokemon that has a combination of orange and black colors.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a fiery beast, perfect for battling in mountainous terrains.
